project_context: Donors, UN & NGOs receive accounts after funds are spent, when the horse is out of the barn. Leaving them few options to control RoI.

project_title: Smart Contract Audit Token SCAT DAO
project_context: Projects receive funding with no clearly defined process to monitor them and ensure funding is properly spent and proposals are completed.
The community currently lacks a way to easily audit the success and outcome of funded proposals
Proposers lack a way to add media (interviews, demos, article) after the finalizing proposal stage and after funding to help auditing
There is currently no financial audit being performed on funded proposals. We want to ensure funds are spent according to budgets as voted.
Voters need accessible, insightful +Â digestible educational resources to learn about 150+ funded Catalyst project's progress and the system.
Funded proposals need public facing progress updates to inform the community and help them audit their progress
No public facing directory of all Catalyst proposals and funded projects: limits the potential to audit, iterate, and innovate.
Difficulty in auditing proposals in a growing community means scalability is affected

No common audit standards in funded proposals.

No consistent evaluation of funded proposals.

Funded reporting is manual.
